suite.name: TC4
suite.test: ======= >>>>>>> 148999c5385b386834b79806b31daf5cb9ffa72e ${URL} Chrome Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``. <<<<<<< HEAD Opening browser 'Chrome' to base url 'https://www.avisto-eastern.com/'. Maximizes current browser window. This keyword hovers the mouse over the "Case Studies" menu and ensures no sub-menu items are displayed. xpath=//span[normalize-space(text())='Case Studies'] Simulates hovering the mouse over the element ``locator``. Simulating Mouse Over on element 'xpath=//span[normalize-space(text())='Case Studies']'. Case Studies Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page. This keyword clicks the "Case Studies" menu item and verifies that the URL is correct (https://www.avisto-eastern.com/case-studies/). //span[normalize-space(text())='Case Studies'] Click the element identified by ``locator``. Clicking element '//span[normalize-space(text())='Case Studies']'. case-studies Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page. https://www.avisto-eastern.com/case-studies/ Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``. Current location is 'https://www.avisto-eastern.com/case-studies/'. This keyword clicks the Avisto logo and verifies that the homepage is opened (https://www.avisto-eastern.com/). xpath=//img[@class='mobile'] Clicks an image identified by ``locator``. Clicking image 'xpath=//img[@class='mobile']'. Home Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page. https://www.avisto-eastern.com/ Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``. Current location is 'https://www.avisto-eastern.com/'. Closes the current browser. This test case verifies the behavior of the "Case Studies" menu. It checks that hovering over the "Case Studies" menu does not reveal any sub-menu items, clicking the "Case Studies" menu item navigates to the case studies page, and clicking the Avisto logo navigates back to the homepage. All Tests ======= Opening browser 'Chrome' to base url 'https://www.avisto-eastern.com/'. Maximizes current browser window. Home < Avisto Eastern Europe Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``. Page title is 'Home < Avisto Eastern Europe'. window.scrollTo(0, document.body.scrollHeight); Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments. Executing JavaScript: window.scrollTo(0, document.body.scrollHeight); Without any arguments. 3s Pauses the test executed for the given time.
